statements: SELECT material_title, material_type, created_on FROM training_materials;
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE material_type='Video';
SELECT material_title, material_content FROM training_materials WHERE created_on > '2022-01-01';
SELECT material_id, material_title FROM training_materials WHERE material_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM training_materials ORDER BY created_on DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_title, material_type, created_on FROM training_materials WHERE material_type = 'Video' ORDER BY created_on DESC
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE material_title LIKE '%tutorial%' LIMIT 10
SELECT material_title, COUNT(material_id) AS total_count FROM training_materials GROUP BY material_title HAVING total_count > 1
SELECT material_id, material_title, material_type, DATE(created_on) AS creation_date FROM training_materials WHERE material_type IN ('Video', 'PDF') ORDER BY creation_date
SELECT material_title, SUBSTRING(material_content, 1, 100) AS preview_content FROM training_materials WHERE LENGTH(material_content) > 100 ORDER BY material_title ASC
SELECT * FROM training_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM training_materials WHERE material_type='Video';
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_description FROM training_materials ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='HR';
SELECT employee_name, role, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE material_type='Guide'
SELECT material_name, material_description FROM training_materials WHERE material_id = 1
SELECT material_name, upload_date FROM training_materials ORDER BY upload_date DESC
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE role='Manager'
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department='Engineering' ORDER BY hire_date ASC
SELECT material_name, material_type, category FROM training_materials
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT'
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC
SELECT material_name, category FROM training_materials WHERE category IN ('Technical', 'Soft Skills')
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees JOIN progress_tracking ON employees.employee_id = progress_tracking.employee_id
SELECT * FROM training_materials WHERE category = 'Software Development';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT progress_id, employee_id, material_id, completion_date FROM progress_tracking WHERE progress_status = 'Completed';
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM training_materials WHERE material_type = 'Video';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department LIKE '%Engineering%' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_type FROM training_materials;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department='IT';
SELECT employee_name, joining_date FROM employees ORDER BY joining_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_type, CHAR_LENGTH(material_content) AS content_length FROM training_materials WHERE material_type='Video';
SELECT department_name, location, manager_id FROM departments WHERE manager_id IS NOT NULL ORDER BY department_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering' ORDER BY joining_date DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM training_materials WHERE material_type = 'Video' AND material_id > 10;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees JOIN departments ON employees.department = departments.department_name WHERE manager_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT employee_name, progress_percentage FROM employees JOIN progress_tracking ON employees.employee_id = progress_tracking.employee_id WHERE progress_percentage >= 50;
SELECT material_name, material_content FROM training_materials WHERE material_type IN ('Video', 'PDF') AND material_id < 100;
SELECT * FROM TrainingMaterials;
SELECT material_name, publish_date, author FROM TrainingMaterials WHERE material_type = 'Video';
SELECT * FROM Employees ORDER BY emp_name ASC;
SELECT emp_name, emp_email, emp_role FROM Employees WHERE emp_department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM SkillDevelopmentPrograms ORDER BY start_date DESC, end_date ASC;
SELECT program_name, description FROM SkillDevelopmentPrograms WHERE program_type = 'Workshop';
SELECT material_name, author, publish_date FROM TrainingMaterials;
SELECT emp_name, emp_role, emp_department FROM Employees WHERE emp_department = 'IT';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date, description FROM SkillDevelopmentPrograms WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT emp_name, program_name, completion_date FROM Employees JOIN EmployeeTrainingRecords ON Employees.emp_id = EmployeeTrainingRecords.emp_id;

SELECT emp_name, program_name, score FROM Employees INNER JOIN EmployeeTrainingRecords ON Employees.emp_id = EmployeeTrainingRecords.emp_id INNER JOIN QuizResults ON EmployeeTrainingRecords.record_id = QuizResults.record_id WHERE score >= 80;
